en.answer:
Since Dark Magician is a DARK Spellcaster-Type monster with 2000 ATK or more, it can be affected by the effect of Black Illusion.

In that case, since Dark Magician is a Normal Monster, the end result is that its effects are not negated, it cannot be destroyed in battle, and it is not affected by the opponent's card effects.
en.question: Dark Magician is a DARK Spellcaster-Type monster with 2000 ATK or more, but since it is a Normal Monster, it does not have an effect. Can it be affected by the effect of Black Illusion, despite being unable to have its effects negated?
en.title: Dark Magician is a DARK Spellcaster-Type monster with 2000 ATK or more, but since it is a Normal Monster, it does not have an effect. Can it be affected by the effect of Black Illusion, despite being unable to have its effects negated?

ja.answer:
「<<4041>>」は魔法使い族・闇属性・攻撃力2000以上のモンスターですので、「<<11129>>」の効果は適用されます。

その場合、「<<4041>>」は通常モンスターですので、結果的に効果は無効化されませんが、戦闘では破壊されなくなり、相手のカードの効果を受けない状態になります。
ja.question: 「<<4041>>」は魔法使い族・闇属性・攻撃力2000以上のモンスターですが、通常モンスターのため、効果を持っていません。効果を無効化する事はできませんが、「<<11129>>」の効果は適用されますか？
ja.title: 通常モンスターの「<<4041>>」に「<<11129>>」の効果は適用されますか？
